title: Science Education Competency Enhancement Program Through Online Collaborative Learning in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science education experience and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Aimed at cultivating practical competencies for current elementary teachers to effectively design and operate online collaborative learning in science classes, conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment with formative assessment providing continuous feedback

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute scientific inquiry projects using online collaboration tools (e.g., Google Jamboard, Miro).
Learners can apply at least three strategies to effectively facilitate small-group collaborative activities in large online classes.
Learners can systematically collect and analyze peer feedback during collaborative learning using formative assessment tools (e.g., Quizizz, Mentimeter).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
